contentDescription.name: contentDescription
contentDescription.prettyName: Content description (Not applicable for "No content" type)

property.code:
{{velocity}} #set($gdprSettings = $util.decodeURI($xwiki.getUserPreferenceFromCookie("gdprSettings"))) #set($param = $xcontext.macro.params.gdprHas)
#if("$!{gdprSettings}" != '') #if("$!{param}" != '') #set($gdprArray = $gdprSettings.split(',')) #if($param == 'preferences') $gdprArray.contains('preferences') #elseif($param == 'statistics') $gdprArray.contains('statistics') #elseif($param == 'marketing') $gdprArray.contains('marketing') #else {{info}}The parameter should be **preferences**, **statistics** or **marketing**.{{/info}} #end #else $gdprSettings #end #else {{info}}The current user has not yet accepted the cookie policy{{/info}} #end {{/velocity}}

property.description: Get what kind of cookies the current user has consented to. (preferences, statistics or marketing)
